attributes.action: enable motorists who do not wish to have "green" cars to be allowed to choose any colour they like when they buy them.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am constantly told by do gooders and busy bodiesI should be driving a Green car-However I like red and Blue-Why should I be descriminated against by not having the colour of my choice?

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
